name: 2Dshooter (pahmel0)
description:
A 2D shooter game made by a student of NTNU university in Norway in a game development course.

Modifications:

1. New game

2. 3 selectable levels

3. Instructions

4. Exit game

Credits: https://www.coursera.org/learn/game-design-and-development-1/home/week/3

Created by Mantas Bagdonavicius
